title: A Genealogical Study in Innsmouth
description: Trace the lineage of the Marsh family and uncover the town's pact with the sea. Involves archival research and discreet conversations with the locals.

title: Restricted Collection Access at Miskatonic
description: Gain sanctioned access to the Miskatonic University library. Read from antiquated maps and unrestricted historical records under the watchful eye of Dr. Armitage.

title: Expedition to the Mountains of Madness
description: Join a geological survey of the Antarctic continent. Explore the alien ruins and attempt to return with your findings—and your sanity—intact.

title: The Dunwich Horror Historical Tour
description: Visit the key sites of the Whateley affair. See the ruins of the farmhouse and the hill where the horror was vanquished.

title: A Stroll Through Ulthar
description: Enjoy a peaceful day in the one town where cats are king. Perfect for weary travelers seeking a brief respite from the encroaching dread.

title: Listen at the Well of Whispers
description: Spend a night by the ancient well, transcribing the fragmented prophecies that bubble up from its depths.

title: The Kingsport Yule Ritual
description: Observe the ancient solstice festival in Kingsport, a tradition far older than the town itself. Participation is not recommended.

title: Chartered Voyage to the Shadowed Reef
description: A boat trip to the unnatural reef off Innsmouth's coast. Collect samples of the oily water and observe the strange marine life.

title: Special Collections Access at Orne Library
description: A deep dive into the restricted archives of Arkham's public library, rumored to hold texts deemed too dangerous for Miskatonic.

title: Sabbat Observation at the Black Goat's Glade
description: From a hidden vantage point, witness the terrible rituals that take place in the woods. To be seen is to be lost.

title: A Night at the Gilman House
description: Rent a room at Innsmouth's only hotel. The challenge isn't checking in, but surviving the night and checking out.

title: Guided Tour of the Witch House
description: A safe, historical tour of a Salem landmark. The perfect daytime activity for those not wishing to tempt fate.

title: Excavation of the Nameless City
description: Join an expedition to unearth the secrets of the pre-human desert city. Beware the low, howling winds.

title: Sail the Oneric Sea to Celephaïs
description: Requires a seasoned oneironaut. Sail from the Gates of Deeper Slumber to the shores of Celephaïs, a journey of impossible beauty within the Dreamlands.

title: Unseen University Enrollment
description: Enroll for a full academic year. The curriculum is transformative, but the final examination has a notoriously low survival rate.

title: A Weekend in Kingsport
description: Enjoy the misty sea views and colonial architecture of this quiet town. A good place to clear one's head after visiting Arkham.

title: Survey the Forbidden Lands
description: Map the periphery of the twisted forests. Do not venture past the ancient stone markers.

title: Investigate the 'Blasted Heath'
description: Investigate the strange, grey dust near the site of the old Nahum Gardner farm, the infamous 'blasted heath' from which the Colour fell.

title: The Arkham Historical Society Walk
description: A guided walking tour of Arkham's public landmarks, carefully avoiding any areas of genuine esoteric significance. Entirely safe.

title: Submarine Tour of Y'ha-nthlei
description: Take a deep-sea vessel to view the sunken city from a safe distance. Do not respond to any psychic communication.

title: Journey to the Plateau of Leng
description: A perilous trek to the high, cold plateau. The goal is to find the monastery where the Tcho-Tcho people worship their dark gods and escape.

title: Interview with Asenath Waite
description: Secure a meeting with the enigmatic Arkham resident known for her strange influence and ancient lineage. Maintain eye contact at your own risk.

title: Tenure Track at Miskatonic University
description: A multi-year academic pursuit. The pay is poor and the faculty politics are terrifying, but access to the library is unparalleled.

title: The Festival
description: An invitation-only affair for the oldest families of Kingsport. Join the procession from the town to the sea cliffs. The flute music is hypnotic.

title: Escape from the Order of Dagon
description: After a failed investigation, you've been captured by the Esoteric Order of Dagon. Escape your holding cell and navigate the tunnels beneath Innsmouth to the sea.

title: The Dreams in the Witch House
description: Rent the supposedly haunted attic room of the old Witch House in Arkham where Walter Gilman once lived. Attempt to survive the nightly visions.

title: Seek the Light of Celephaïs
description: A pilgrimage for experienced dreamers. Learn the paths through the Enchanted Wood to find the eternal sunset of the city of Celephaïs.

title: Comparative Anatomy: Deep Ones
description: A graduate-level biology course at Miskatonic University. The subject of dissection is... unique. Offered only by Dr. Wilmarth.

title: Smuggling Run from Innsmouth
description: The Marsh refinery is paying well for discreet exports of their strange gold jewelry. Evade the federal agents and don't ask what the cargo is.

title: Audit the Books of Arkham Sanitarium
description: The local asylum's books don't add up. Investigate their finances and patient records to uncover a far more sinister operation.

title: Translate the Pnakotic Manuscripts
description: A lengthy scholarly project to translate a section of the pre-human Pnakotic Manuscripts. Requires immense concentration and academic rigor.

title: Debate with a Yithian
description: Engage in a battle of intellects with a visiting professor whose mind has been swapped with a member of the Great Race of Yith. A truly mind-expanding experience.

title: Investigate Disappearances at the Docks
description: Several sailors have gone missing near the Innsmouth docks. The local constabulary is useless. Find out what's really happening after dark.

title: Chart the Gulf of N'tah
description: A dangerous voyage across the primary sea of the Dreamlands. Avoid the basalt pillars of the Basilisks of the Abyss and the dreaded Moon-things.

title: Photograph the Fungi from Yuggoth
description: Strange fungi have been reported growing in the woods near Arkham after a meteor shower. Capture them on film before the authorities intervene.

title: Open a Curiosity Shop in Arkham
description: Live the quiet life of an Arkham shopkeeper. Your biggest challenge will be distinguishing between genuine antiquities and dangerous, soul-binding artifacts.

title: Survive the Rite of Azathoth
description: A cult has summoned you to the Nameless City to bear witness to the Daemon Sultan. The goal is simple: do not get devoured.

title: Repair the Gilman House Plumbing
description: Even in Innsmouth, pipes leak. A surprisingly normal, if unsettlingly damp, contract job at the infamous hotel.

title: Follow the Black Cat of Ulthar
description: A single, unusually large black cat is said to guard a secret in Ulthar. Follow it from the town square to see where it goes.

title: Guest Lecture on Pre-humanoid Architecture
description: Deliver a lecture to the Miskatonic architectural history department. Be prepared for pointed questions from Professor Peaslee.

title: Psychiatric Evaluation at Arkham Sanitarium
description: Go undercover as a patient to find out what happened to a previous investigator. Gaining entry is easy; proving you're sane enough to leave is not.

title: Paint the Sunset over Kingsport Harbor
description: Capture the strange, otherworldly colors of a Kingsport sunset. A favorite pastime of local artist Richard Upton Pickman.

title: Close a Ghoul Tunnel
description: A fresh tunnel has been discovered leading from the graveyard to the basement of a house on French Hill. You've been hired to seal it, permanently.

title: Survive a Night on the Isle of the Damned
description: Be voluntarily marooned on the foggy island for a single night. The goal is to document the fluting music and whatever creatures make it.

title: Debunk the 'Miracles' at the Church of Starry Wisdom
description: A new cult has taken over an old church in Arkham, claiming to perform miracles. Infiltrate their ranks and expose them as frauds... if they are.

title: Catalog the Miskatonic Meteorite Collection
description: An internship at the Miskatonic geology department. One of the meteorites in the collection seems to pulse with a faint, internal light.

title: Decommission the Marsh Gold Refinery
description: Join the official government raid on the Innsmouth gold refinery. Expect heavy, amphibious resistance.

title: Restore a Damaged Copy of the Necronomicon
description: The library's prized possession has suffered water damage. A task for only the steadiest of hands and minds. Do not read the passages you restore.

title: Investigate the Tillinghast Estate
description: Crawford Tillinghast is dead, and his laboratory is a crime scene. Analyze the strange energies and residues left behind by his resonance machine.

title: Petition the Cat General of Ulthar
description: You require safe passage through the nearby woods. A formal request must be made to the large, decorated cat who commands the town's feline militia.

title: Apprentice under Richard Pickman
description: Become the student of Boston's most infamous artist. Learn his techniques for painting unnervingly realistic ghouls and other creatures of the night.

title: Win the Innsmouth Fishing Derby
description: A surprisingly normal annual town event. The fish are large, oddly shaped, and have far too many eyes, but the prize money is good.

title: Serve on a Jury in Dunwich
description: You've been called for jury duty. The case involves a property dispute between two branches of the Whateley family. Justice is... complicated here.

title: Climb the Onyx Steps of the Dreamlands
description: Ascend the 700 onyx steps to the 'Cavern of Flame' where the Cat-gods themselves reside. Present your petition with the utmost respect.

title: Steal the Shining Trapezohedron
description: Heist of the century. Infiltrate the Starry Wisdom church and steal the artifact that summons the Haunter of the Dark. Do not look directly at it.

title: Repossess a Whateley Farm
description: As an agent of the Arkham Bank, you must repossess a farm from a delinquent branch of the Whateley family. They do not take kindly to visitors.

title: Photograph the Strange High House in the Mist
description: A single house sits atop the sheer cliffs of Kingsport, a house that seems impossible to reach. Capture photographic proof of its existence and its inhabitant.

title: Flee Across the Plateau of Leng
description: You have stolen an artifact from the Tcho-Tcho people. Now you must cross the vast, soul-crushing plateau with them in pursuit.

title: Negotiate Trade with the Gugs
description: The Gugs of the Dreamlands' underworld have something you need. Descend into their city and barter for it. Do not mention their vertical mouths.

title: Publish a Scandal Sheet in Arkham
description: Expose the secret corruption and strange dealings of Arkham's elite. Stay one step ahead of the people you're writing about.

title: Study the Effects of the Colour
description: A Miskatonic-funded study into the lingering effects of the 'Colour Out of Space'. Collect samples of soil, water, and mutated flora from the blasted heath.

title: Bartend at an Innsmouth Tavern
description: The best way to gather information is to serve drinks. Overhear conversations and try to ignore the webbing on your patrons' hands.

title: Cross-reference the Eltdown Shards
description: The Eltdown Shards contain fragmented, contradictory histories. Compare the Miskatonic copy with collections from other libraries to find the truth.

title: Seek Asylum with the Ghouls
description: You're on the run from a powerful human enemy in Arkham. Your only hope is to seek protection in the ghoul warrens beneath the city.

title: Survive the Protoplasmic Mass
description: You have disturbed a Shoggoth in the ruins of the Elder Things' city. It is now hunting you. The only goal is escape.

title: Attend an Estate Sale in Kingsport
description: An old sea captain has died, and his estate is being auctioned off. A chance to acquire rare maritime artifacts and scrimshaw of dubious origin.

title: Exorcise the Curwen House
description: The spirit of the necromancer Joseph Curwen still haunts his old property. You have been hired by the city to cleanse the house once and for all.

title: Investigate the Innsmouth Look
description: Study the strange congenital condition that affects the residents of Innsmouth as they age. What is the biological basis for the 'Innsmouth Look'?

title: Prevent the Return of the Great Old Ones
description: A cult is about to complete a ritual to awaken Cthulhu as R'lyeh rises. Intercept their ship and disrupt the ceremony at all costs.

title: Intern at the Miskatonic Herald
description: A summer internship at Arkham's local newspaper. Cover town hall meetings and bake sales, and studiously ignore your editor's warnings about 'the wrong kind of stories'.

title: Document the Flora of the Dreamlands
description: A scientific survey of the impossible plant life of the Dreamlands, from the singing flowers of the Enchanted Woods to the phosphorescent fungi of the Underworld.

title: Infiltrate the Unseen University
description: Pose as a visiting scholar to gain access to the Unseen University's forbidden library and learn their secrets from within.

title: Map the Tunnels Beneath Innsmouth
description: The Esoteric Order of Dagon uses a series of subterranean and sub-aquatic tunnels to move about. Create a definitive map of their network.

title: Join the Arkham Police Department
description: A long-term career choice. Deal with everyday crime while slowly becoming aware of the darker, unwritten laws that truly govern the city.

title: Find the Kadath in the Cold Waste
description: An epic quest across the entirety of the Dreamlands to find the hidden home of the gods themselves atop the mountain of Kadath.

title: Perform at the Miskatonic Music Hall
description: Open mic night at the university. A chance for students and faculty to show off their artistic talents. Avoid playing any music by Erich Zann.

title: Run for Mayor of Innsmouth
description: You believe you can change the town from the inside. Challenge the Marsh family's grip on power in the local election. The debates are intense.

title: Study the Non-Euclidean Angles of R'lyeh
description: During a brief emergence of the city, take precise measurements of its impossible architecture. A career-defining, and possibly-ending, research paper awaits.

title: Discredit a Rival Professor at Miskatonic
description: The tenure committee has one spot left. Use academic sabotage to ensure your rival's research on the 'Serpent People' is publicly humiliated.

title: Survive a Hunting Trip with the Whateleys
description: To gain their trust, you've accepted an invitation to go hunting in the backwoods of Dunwich. The question is, what are you hunting?

title: Collect unpaid debts for the Arkham Mob
description: You owe a favor to the local crime syndicate. Your job is to 'persuade' several prominent citizens to pay their outstanding loans.

title: Winter Caretaker for the Isle of the Damned
description: A job that pays extremely well. Look after the abandoned lighthouse during the desolate winter months. Your only instruction: 'Do not follow the music'.

title: Acquire a Deep One Hybrid for a Sideshow
description: A traveling circus has offered a huge sum for a genuine, living specimen from Innsmouth. A capture mission that is both dangerous and depraved.

title: Host a Radio Talk Show in Arkham
description: Run a late-night call-in show on Arkham's local radio station. The callers have the most unusual stories.

title: Perform in the Unspeakable Promise
description: The Miskatonic drama club is putting on a play recovered from a pre-human city. The audience reviews have been 'maddeningly good'.

title: Investigate the Silver Key's Disappearance
description: The famed dreamer Randolph Carter has vanished, and his powerful artifact, the Silver Key, is gone with him. Retrace his last known steps.

title: Serve papers to Herbert West
description: You are a process server with a simple task: deliver a subpoena to the reclusive and disgraced medical student, Herbert West. Do not accept any invitations into his lab.

title: Explore the Vaults of Zin
description: A journey deep into the lightless underworld of the Dreamlands. The ghasts that live here are hostile, and the path is treacherous.

title: Establish a Sanity-Restoring Spa in Kingsport
description: Capitalize on the constant stream of traumatized investigators from Arkham by offering a place of peace and recovery. A sound business model.

title: Sabotage the Miskatonic Antarctic Expedition
description: A rival university has hired you to sabotage the drilling equipment of the Pabodie expedition before they depart, ensuring they cannot uncover what lies beneath the ice.

title: Rescue a Cat from the Moon-things
description: The toad-like Moon-things have captured a sacred cat from Ulthar and taken it to their lunar base. Lead a rescue mission with the full backing of the Cat General.

title: Investigate the Quality of Innsmouth Gold
description: The strange, almost greenish gold from the Marsh refinery has unique properties. Conduct a scientific analysis to determine its elemental composition and origin.

title: Guard a shipment for the Tcho-Tcho people
description: You've been hired as a mercenary to guard a mysterious caravan crossing the Plateau of Leng. Your only instructions are to shoot anyone who tries to look inside the cargo.

title: Conduct a Census of Dunwich
description: The US Government needs an accurate population count. Going door-to-door in Dunwich presents unique challenges, as some residents are... reclusive.

title: Seek a cure for the 'Innsmouth Look'
description: A desperate heir of the Marsh line has hired you to use the Miskatonic medical facilities to find a cure or treatment for their family's transformative condition.

title: Authenticate a painting by Richard Pickman
description: A wealthy collector has acquired a painting believed to be 'Ghoul Feeding' by the infamous Pickman. Your job is to verify its authenticity and, if possible, its model.

title: Tutor a Whateley child
description: Old Man Whateley has hired you to teach his grandson, Wilbur, to read. The boy is a prodigious learner, but his questions are unsettling.

title: Smash the Loab-an Cult
description: The Unseen University has a pest problem. A small but dangerous cult is operating out of their sub-basement. You are the exterminator.

title: Lead a Pilgrimage to the Nameless City
description: You are the prophet of a new faith. Lead your followers on a spiritual journey across the desert to the one place you believe holds all the answers.

title: Vacation on the Shores of Lake Hali
required_items: A Copy of 'The King in Yellow'
description: A peaceful, lakeside retreat in a quiet corner of the Dreamlands. The twin suns are beautiful, and the faint, distant singing is probably nothing to worry about.

title: Expose the Arkham Historical Society
description: The society is a front for something much older and more sinister. Use your membership to uncover the truth about their 'private collection' and rituals.

title: Brew Beer for the Gilman House
description: The Gilman House needs a new house ale. Your task is to create a brew that the Innsmouth locals will enjoy. The flavor profile is... unique.

title: Lobby for historic preservation of Dunwich
description: Make a case to the Massachusetts state government that the crumbling, gambrel-roofed houses of Dunwich are a vital piece of state history worth preserving.

title: Retire a Rogue Agent from the Unseen University
description: A former professor has gone rogue and threatens to expose the University's secrets. Your mission is to 'persuade' him into a permanent retirement.

title: Perform a Counter-ritual at the Shadowed Reef
description: The Deep Ones are performing a ritual to expand their influence. Sail to the reef under the cover of a storm and perform a rite of banishment.

title: Translate the Glyphs on the Black Monolith
description: Make a detailed rubbing of the strange, alien writing on the monolith in the glade and attempt a translation. Best done during the daytime.

title: Map the Catacombs of Ptolemais
description: The ancient catacombs beneath the Dreamlands city of Ptolemais are said to hold great treasures, but are also a sprawling, dangerous maze.

title: Investigate the Strange Cargo of the 'Sea Serpent'
description: A ship has arrived in Innsmouth from the South Pacific with a heavily guarded, mysterious cargo. Sneak aboard and find out what it is.

title: Write an Obituary for a Ghoul
description: The ghouls' beloved elder has passed on. They have commissioned you to write a fitting tribute to be published (anonymously) in the Arkham Advertiser.

title: Play Chess against a Brain Cylinder
description: Test your wits against the disembodied brain of a Yithian scientist, currently housed in a nutrient-filled cylinder in the Miskatonic physics department.

title: Build a Breakwater for Kingsport
description: A civil engineering project to protect Kingsport harbor from the unusually violent winter storms.

title: Track the Hound of Tindalos
description: A creature that moves through the angles of time has manifested in Arkham. Track its movements and find a way to banish it before it finds you.

title: Survive Final Exams at Miskatonic
description: The most terrifying ordeal of all. Complete your final exams in subjects like 'Advanced Necromancy' and 'Theoretical Yithian History'.

title: Steal the Formulas from Herbert West
description: A rival university wants West's reanimation formula. Your mission is a simple breaking-and-entering. Avoid his 'experiments' in the basement.

title: Close the Portal in the Witch House Attic
description: The strange angles in the attic of the old Witch House form a stable gateway. You must perform the ritual to seal it shut forever.

title: Investigate the Disappearance of a Zookeeper
description: A zookeeper from the Arkham Zoo has vanished. The only clue is a series of strange, webbed tracks leading from the reptile house.

title: Document the Art of the Elder Things
description: Amid the ruins in Antarctica are vast, carved murals depicting the history of the Elder Things. Your job is to create a complete record of these carvings.

title: Fish for Glimmer-fish in Celephaïs
description: A peaceful and beautiful pastime in the eternal city of the Dreamlands. The glimmer-fish are said to contain beautiful dreams.

title: Smash the Idols of the Tcho-Tcho
description: Infiltrate the monastery on the Plateau of Leng and destroy the sacred idols to which the Tcho-Tcho people perform their terrible rites.

title: Audit the Miskatonic Acquisitions Budget
description: The library's budget for acquiring 'rare books' is astronomical. Find out where the money is really going and who is approving these purchases.

title: Become the new Lighthouse Keeper
description: The old lighthouse keeper in Kingsport retired abruptly. Take over his duties of tending the light. Try to ignore the shapes you see in the fog.

title: Repel the Night-gaunts from the Peaks of Thok
description: The faceless, winged Night-gaunts have become aggressive. Drive them from their mountain nests to ensure the safety of dream-travelers below.

title: Investigate the Innsmouth High School Swim Team
description: The Innsmouth swim team has won the state championship for 30 years running. Discover the secret to their unnatural aquatic abilities.

title: Act as a Bodyguard for a Visiting Professor
description: A professor visiting Arkham to give a lecture on 'The Serpent People' has received numerous threats. Your job is to ensure he survives his visit.

title: Foreclose on the Whateley Mill
description: The old mill has been in the Whateley family for generations, but the bank owns it now. Your simple task is to deliver the foreclosure notice.

title: Seek the Garden of Forking Paths
description: Somewhere in the Dreamlands lies a garden that contains every possible future. Find this garden and attempt to navigate its paths without going mad.

title: Conduct a geological survey of the Well of Whispers
description: Determine the depth and subterranean structure of the mysterious well in the Arkham woods. What is the source of the whispers?

title: Start a Rival Fish Cannery in Innsmouth
description: Challenge the monopoly of the Marsh Seafood Cannery. This is not just business; it's a declaration of war.

title: Give a tour of Miskatonic to prospective students
required_items: A Script of approved talking points
description: Show high school students and their parents around the beautiful campus. Be sure to emphasize the football team and avoid the west wing of the library.

title: Close the Case on Joseph Curwen
description: The official file on the 18th-century necromancer Joseph Curwen was never closed. Re-open the case, follow the evidence, and put an end to the story for good.
